channel.title: Generation x remake (YAY) SPAWN / ECO IN ONE
channel.description:
well one day i dcided to make a generation x remake and i hosted it and got up 2 100 players + online then i got sick of spawn server and went on to eco
these pics r all not for this source im just copying and paste off my old google page when i was hosting i was hosting 2 servers 634 and a 317 (pi) wich was generation x
so here it is this is all off google
gen x is a server which has been in development, and we feature lots of unique content which you won’t find in any other server! We have a working vote system, high scores, lots of bosses, 99.99999% accurate combat formula, pvp, and much more!
new download link
http://uppit.com/e688oix01n64/PK_X_ILE_v2.rar
GEN X Features:
Always lots of people online
Uptime: 24/7 hosted on a powerful dedicated server
Why play GEN X?!
Are you tired of small servers with depressing hits? Don’t want to spend months or even years on getting skills? Are you a beast pker but you can’t find any server to pk on? Well, if you recognize yourself in this, GEN X IS the place for you. We have beast pking, with instant item switching for the maximum hybridding experience. The pking is great, just take a look at the pictures, so play GEN X now! Or die...
Features:
- ZERO lag - Active player base, over 300 players online! - 24/7 online! No fucking downtime! - Instant item switching, best bridding you can get. - ::master and Spawning (::item) - Chaotics and Pvp armours - Organized Vbulletin Forums - Fully working Turmoil and Overload potions - Beast hits, tired of hitting 0s all the time?? - Spirit Shields - Slayer Helmet - Staff Of Light - Dragon Claws - Correct Vengeance emote
Simply the best, join now
some pics
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/qswo77.gif[/img]
[img]http://generationx-ps.com/pics/gxpics/gifs/pking1.gif[/img]
[img]http://generationx-ps.com/pics/gxpics/gifs/ags.gif[/img]
[img]http://generationx-ps.com/pics/gxpics/gifs/claws.gif[/img]
[img]http://generationx-ps.com/pics/gxpics/gifs/claws.gif[/img]
[img]http://generationx-ps.com/pics/newclient/turm.png[/img]
[img]http://generationx-ps.com/pics/newclient/veng.png[/img]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2psfwgz.gif http://i.min.us/ilpysy.png[/img]
[img]http://www.runemyth.com/adpics/pestcontrol2.png[/img]
[img]http://i559.photobucket.com/albums/ss34/lebo-gangsta/bosses1.jpg[/img]
credits: extreme pking for source base and ACE (me)
i will be looking forward 2 a v2 but this is all for now
here r links
source: http://uppit.com/ggd30o5xwxdn/generation_x_remake_source.rar
client: http://uppit.com/4zyf3bjdul7q/gen_x_client.rar
the client is the one i used for my server so it will be on my ip to change to urs or w/e go to gui and client.java and search for 66. delet that ip and put for example 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 or ur ip
and then ofc u need to compile so dnt come on my server spamming how to change it ok...
THIS SERVER IS A SPAWN / ECO MEANING THAT U CANT SPAWN ALL ITEMS AND I HAVE HALF WAY ADDED A DUNG U JUST NEED TO ADD THE DROPS
I HAVE MADE THE ::PKSET ::POTS ::FOOD ::MAGESET LIKE GENERATION X U CANT SPAWN CASH U NEED TO MAKE THE CASH BUT U CAN CHANGE THIS
THANKS MADE BY (ACE)
WHO EVER SAYES THIS IS A KEY LOGGER OR VIRUS R IDIOTS I JUST LOLED AT THEM
AND FOR THE PEOPLE WHO SAY WAT HAPPEN TO EXTREME PKING STUFF I REMOVED EM BECUZ THEY WERE JUST BRINGING MORE LAGG 2 SERVER AFTER I REMOVED EM SERVER STARTED TO GO SMOOTH
AND FOR THE PEOPLE WHO SAY GENERATION X IS STILL RUNNING
GENERATION X IS NOT RUNNING A SPAWN SERVER ANYMORE THEY R RUNNING A ECO AND THE SERVER THAT WAS CALLED GEN X SPAWN SERVER WAS MYN
